edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.applicationlogic.routing
Interface RoutingStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
RoutingStrategyImpl
public interface RoutingStrategy

Describes a routing algorithm for calculating a route between to points on the KITCampus.

Author:
Fred

Method Summary
 Route calculateRoute(MapPosition from, MapPosition to)
          Calculates a route from from to to.
 

Method Detail

calculateRoute

Route calculateRoute(MapPosition from,
                     MapPosition to)
Calculates a route from from to to. This class delegates the actual calculation. If there is no route between those positions, null will be returned

Parameters:
from - Position the route starts at.
to - Position the route ends at.
Returns:
The route between from and to or null.
